attributes.action: disagree with the proposals to either “close” or “transfer activity to another Higher Education Institute” the Department of Politics & Communications, the Department of Philosophy, or the Department of Statistics at the University of Liverpool.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The University of Liverpool is currently deciding whether or not its Politics and Communications Department as well as its Philosophy Department and Statistics and Probability Division, should be closed.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
